item.title: A (un)biased story
item.description: I want to tell you a story somebody shared with me. Nobody knows where the story comes from, or who invented it, but now it’s widely used as an exercise to improve communication skills. I changed the names of the characters in order to be gender neutral, so, please, bear with me as some sentences are bulky. Once upon a time, a long long time ago, there was a town. The town was cut in two halves by a large river.
